T02prmosu_u:35: yaḥ punar bhikṣur manuṣyaṃ svahastena saṃcintya jīvitād vyaparopayec chastraṃ vainam ādhārayec chastrādhārakaṃ vāsya paryeṣayed evaṃ vainaṃ vaded dhambhoḥ puruṣa kiṃ tavānena pāpakena durjīvitena mṛtaṃ te jīvitād varam iti cittānumataṃ cittasaṃkalpitam anekaparyāyeṇa maraṇāya samādāpayen maraṇavarṇaṃ vāsyānusaṃvarṇayet sa ca tenopakrameṇa kālaṃ kuryād ayam api bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyaḥ 3

T02prmosu_u:76: āyuṣmanto madvacanād alaṃ vo m. + + ktena sa bhikṣur bhikṣubhir evaṃ syād vacanīyo mā tvam āyuṣmann uddeśaparyāpannaiḥ śikṣāpadair bhikṣubhiḥ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayenocyamāna ātmānam avacanīyaṃ kārṣīr vacanīyam evāyuṣmān ātmānaṃ karotu āyuṣma(n)tam api bhikṣavo vakṣyanti saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena āyuṣmān api bhikṣūṃ vadatu saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena evaṃ saṃvṛddhā tasya bhagavataḥ pariṣad yadutānyonyavacanīyād anyonyāvavādād anyonyānuśāsanād anyonyāpattivyutthāpanān niḥsṛjatv āyuṣm(ā)n ātma(na)

T02prmosu_u:83: imau punar āyuṣmanto dvāv aniyatau dharmāv anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchataḥ
T02prmosu_u:84: yaḥ punar bhikṣur mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdham ekaikena rahasi praticchanne āsane niṣadyāṃ kalpayed alaṃ gama(n)īyena taṃ ca śrāddheyavacanopāsikā trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇām anyatamānyatamena dharmeṇa vadet pārājikena vā saṃghāvaśeṣeṇa vā
T02prmosu_u:85: pātayantikena vā niṣadyāṃ bhikṣuḥ pratijānamānas trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇām anyatamānyatamena dharmeṇa kārayitavyaḥ pārājikena vā saṃghāvaśeṣeṇa vā pātayantikena vā yena yena dharmeṇa vā śrāddheyavacanopāsikā taṃ bhikṣuṃ vadet tena tena sa bhikṣuḥ k(ā)rayitavyaḥ ayaṃ dharmo 'niyataḥ 1
T02prmosu_u:86: na ca rahasi praticchanne āsane niṣadyāṃ kalpayen nāla(ṃ) gamanīyena api tu taṃ m(ā)tṛgrāmaṃ duṣṭhulayā vācā ābhāṣeta pāpikayā asabhyayā maithunopasaṃhitayā taṃ ca śrāddheyavacanopāsikā dvayor dharmayor
T02prmosu_u:87: anyatamānyatamena dharmeṇa vadet saṃghāvaśeṣeṇa vā pātayantikena vā niṣadyāṃ bhikṣuḥ pratijānamāno dvayor dharmayor anyatamānyatamena dharmeṇa kārayitavyaḥ saṃghāvaśeṣeṇa vā pā(t)ayantikena vā yena yena dharmeṇa vā śrāddheyavacanopāsikā taṃ bhikṣuṃ vadet tena tena sa bhikṣuḥ kārayitavyaḥ
T02prmosu_u:89: uddiṣṭau mayāyuṣma(n)to dvāv aniyatau dharmau tatrāham āyuṣmataḥ pṛcchāmi
T02prmosu_u:90: kaccit sthātra pariśuddhā dvir api trir api pṛcchāmi kaccit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto (yasmā)t tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi
T02prmosu_u:92: ime puna(r ā)yuṣmantas triṃśan niḥsargikāḥ pātayantikā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti //
T02prmosu_u:93: niṣṭhitacīvareṇa bhikṣuṇā uddhṛte kaṭhine daśāhaparamam atiriktaṃ cīvaraṃ dhārayitavyaṃ tata uttaraṃ dhārayen niḥsargikā pātayantikā 1
T02prmosu_u:94: niṣṭhitacīvaro bhikṣur uddhṛte kaṭhine ekarātram api trayāṇāṃ cīvarāṇām anyatamānyatamasmāc cīvarād vipravased anyatra saṃghasaṃmatyā niḥsargikā pātayantikā 2

T02prmosu_u:96: kṣipram eva kṛ(tvā) dhārayitavyaṃ no cet paripūryeta māsaparamaṃ tena
T02prmosu_u:97: bhikṣuṇā tac cīvaram upanikṣi(ptavyaṃ) satyā(ṃ) cīvarapratyāśāyām ūnasya vā paripūryārthaṃ tata uttaram upanikṣipen niḥsargikā pātaya(n)tikā 3
T02prmosu_u:98: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ajñātyā bhikṣuṇyā purāṇacīvaraṃ dhāvayed vā rañjayed vā ākoṭayed vā niḥsargikā pātayantik(ā) 4
T02prmosu_u:99: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ajñātyā bhikṣuṇyāḥ santikāc cīvaraṃ pratigṛhṇīyād anyatra parivartakena niḥsargikā pātayantikā 5

T02prmosu_u:104: bhi)kṣu(ṃ) śrā(d)dh(o) gṛhapatir gṛhapatipatnī vā saṃbahulaiś cīvarai(ḥ)
T02prmosu_u:105: pravārayed ākāṃkṣamāṇena tena bhikṣuṇā sāntarottarapa(ra)ma(ṃ) tataś cīvaraṃ pratigṛhītavyaṃ tata uttaraṃ prati(gṛhṇīyān n)iḥsargikā
T02prmosu_u:107: bhikṣuṃ punar uddiśya ajñātinā gṛhapatinā gṛhapatipatnyā vā cīvaracetanakāny upaskṛtāni syur ebhir ahaṃ cīvaracetanakair evaṃrūpa(m)
T02prmosu_u:108: e(vaṃ)rūpaṃ cīvaraṃ cetayitvā evaṃnāmānaṃ bhikṣum ācchādayiṣyāmīti tatra cet sa bhikṣuḥ pūrva(m a)pravāritaḥ samānaḥ upasaṃkramya ajñātiṃ
T02prmosu_u:109: gṛhapatiṃ gṛhapatipatnīṃ vā kaṃcid eva v(i)k(a)lp(am ā)padyann evaṃ vaded yāni tāny āyuṣmatā mām uddiśya cīvaracetanakāny upaskṛtāny ebhi(ś
T02prmosu_u:111: (e)va(ṃ)nāmānaṃ bhikṣum ācchādayiṣyāmīti sādhv āyuṣmaṃs taiś cīvara(ceta)nakair evaṃrūpam evaṃrūpaṃ cīvaraṃ cetayitvā cīvareṇa mā(m
T02prmosu_u:112: ā)cchādayeti kalyāṇakāmatām upādāya abhiniṣpanne cīvare niḥsargikā pātayantikā 8
T02prmosu_u:113: bhikṣuṃ punar uddiśya dvābhyām ajñātibhyāṃ gṛhapatibhyāṃ gṛhapati patnībhyāṃ vā pratyekacīvaracetanakāny upaskṛtāni syur ebhir āvāṃ cīvaracetanakair evaṃrūpaṃ evaṃrūpaṃ pratyekacīvaraṃ cetayitvā evaṃnāmānaṃ bhikṣum ācchādayiṣyāvaḥ pratyekacīvarābhyām iti /
T02prmosu_u:114: tatra cet sa bhikṣuḥ pūrvam apravāritaḥ samāna upasaṃkramya tau dvāv ajñātī gṛhapatī gṛhapatipatnyau vā kaṃcid eva vikalpam āpadyann evaṃ vaded yāni tāny āyuṣmadbhyāṃ mām uddiśya cīvaracetanakāny upaskṛtāny ebhir āvāṃ cīvaracetanakair evaṃ(rūpam e)vaṃrūpaṃ pratyekacīvaraṃ cetayitvā evaṃnāmānaṃ bhikṣum ācchādayiṣyāvaḥ sādhv āyuṣmantau taiś cīvaracetanakair evaṃrūpam evaṃrūpa(ṃ) pratyekacīvaraṃ cetayitv(ā)cchādayata(ṃ) māṃ cīvareṇa ubhau bhūtvaikeneti kalyāṇakāmatām upādāyābhiniṣpanne cīvare
T02prmosu_u:116: bhikṣuṃ punar uddiśya rājñā vā rājamahāmātreṇa vā brāhmaṇena vā gṛhapatinā vā dūtasya haste cīvaracetanakāni preṣitāni syuḥ sa dūtas taṃ bhikṣum upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vaded imāni te āyuṣm(a)ṃ rājñā vā rāja(mah)ā(m)ā(tr)eṇa
T02prmosu_u:117: vā brāhm(a)ṇ(e)na (vā) gṛhapati(nā vā cī)varacetanakāni preṣitāni pratigṛhṇātv āyuṣmāṃ cīvaracetanakāny anukampām upādāya /
T02prmosu_u:118: sa bhikṣus taṃ dūtam evaṃ vaden nāyuṣman dūta kalpante bhikṣūṇāṃ cīvaracetanakāni pratigṛhītuṃ cīvaraṃ tu vayaṃ labdhvā kālena kalpikaṃ svahastaṃ pratigṛhya kṣipram eva kṛtvā dhārayāmaḥ sa dūtas taṃ bhikṣum evaṃ vaded asty āyuṣmatāṃ kaścid vaiyyāpatyakaro yo bhikṣūṇāṃ vaiyyāpatyaṃ karoti /
T02prmosu_u:119: cīvarārthikena bhikṣuṇā vaiyyāpatyakaro vyapadeṣṭavya ārāmiko vā upāsako vā eṣa bhikṣūṇāṃ vaiyyāpatyaṃ karoti /
T02prmosu_u:120: sa dūtas taṃ vaiyyāpatyakaram upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vaded imāny āyuṣmaṃ vaiyyāpatyakara cīvaracetanakāni rājñā vā rājamahāmātreṇa vā brāhmaṇena vā gṛhapatinā vā evaṃnāmānaṃ bhikṣum uddiśya preṣitāni sādhv āyuṣmaṃ vaiyyāpatyakara tvam ebhiś cīvaracetanakair evaṃrūpam evaṃrūpaṃ cīvaraṃ cetayitvā sa bhikṣus tvām upasaṃkramiṣyati kālena taṃ tvam ācchādaya cīvareṇa kalpikeneti /
T02prmosu_u:121: evaṃ sa dūtas taṃ vaiyyāpatyakaraṃ sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca samanuśiṣya taṃ bhikṣum upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vaded yo sāv āyuṣmatā vaiyyāpatyakaro vyapadiṣṭaḥ samanuśiṣṭaḥ sa mayā /
T02prmosu_u:122: taṃ tvam upasaṃkrama kālena ācchādayiṣyati tvāṃ cīvareṇa kalpikeneti /
T02prmosu_u:123: cīvarārthikena bhikṣuṇā vaiyyāpatyakaram upasaṃkramya dvis triś codayitavyaḥ smārayitavyaḥ artho me vaiyyāpatyakara cīvareṇa dvis triś codayataḥ smārayataḥ saced abhiniṣpadyeta cīvaram ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no ced abhiniṣpadyeta catuṣpañcaṣaṭkṛtvāparamaṃ tūṣṇīm uddeśe sthātavyaṃ tūṣṇīm uddeśe sthitasya saced abhiniṣpadyeta cīvaram ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no ced abhiniṣpadyeta tata uttaraṃ vyāyameta cīvarasyābhiniṣpattaye abhiniṣpanne
T02prmosu_u:125: no ced abhiniṣpadyeta tena bhikṣuṇā yatas tāni cīvaracetanakāny ānītāni tatra svayaṃ vā gantavyaṃ dūto vā preṣitavyo yāni tāny āyuṣmatā mām uddiśya cīvaracetanakāni preṣitāni na tāny asmākaṃ kaṃcid arthaṃ prakurvanti prajānātv āyuṣmā(ṃ) svam arthaṃ mā te praṇaśyed iyaṃ tatra sāmīciḥ yaḥ punar bhikṣur navaṃ kauśeyaṃ saṃstaraṃ kārayen niḥsargikā pātayantikā
T02prmosu_u:126: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ śuddhakāḍānām eḍakalomnāṃ navaṃ saṃstaraṃ kārayen niḥsargikā pātayantikā
T02prmosu_u:127: navaṃ punar bhikṣuṇā saṃstaraṃ kārayatā dvau bhāgau śuddhakāḍānām eḍakalomnām ādātavyau tṛtīyo 'vadātānāṃ caturtho gocarikānām anādāya ced bhikṣur dvau bhāgau śuddhakāḍānām eḍakalomnām tṛtīyam avadātānāṃ caturthaṃ
T02prmosu_u:128: gocarikānāṃ navaṃ saṃstaraṃ kārayet kalyāṇakāmatām upādāya niḥsargikā pātayantikā 13
T02prmosu_u:129: navaṃ punar bhikṣuṇā saṃstaraṃ kārayitvā akāmaṃ ṣaḍ varṣāṇi dhārayitavyaṃ arvāk ced bhikṣuḥ ṣaḍbhyo varṣebhyaḥ purāṇasaṃstaraṃ niḥsṛjya vā aniḥsṛjya vā anyaṃ navaṃ saṃstaraṃ kārayed anyatra saṃghasaṃmatyā kalyāṇakāmatām upādāya niḥsargikā pātayantikā 14
T02prmosu_u:130: navaṃ bhikṣuṇā niṣīdanasaṃstaraṃ kārayatā purāṇaniṣīdanasaṃstarasāmantakāt sugatavitastir ādātavyā navasya durvarṇīkaraṇāya anādāya ced bhikṣuḥ purāṇaniṣīdanasaṃstarasāmantakāt sugatavitastiṃ navasya durvarṇīkaraṇāya navaṃ niṣīdanasaṃstaraṃ kārayet kalyāṇakāmatām upādāya niḥsargikā
T02prmosu_u:132: bhikṣoś ced adhvānamārgapratipannasyotpadyerann eḍakalomāni ākāṅkṣatā tena bhikṣuṇā pratigṛhītavyāni pratigṛhya yāvat triyojanaparamaṃ svayaṃ hartavyāny asati hartari tata uttaraṃ haren niḥsargikā pātayantikā 16
T02prmosu_u:133: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ajñātyā bhikṣuṇyā eḍakalomāni dhāvayed vā rañjayed vā vijaṭayed vā niḥsargikā pātayantikā 17
T02prmosu_u:134: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ svahastaṃ rūpyam u(d)gṛhṇīyād vā udgrāhayed vā
T02prmosu_u:136: yaḥ punar bhikṣur nānāprakāraṃ rūpyavyavahāraṃ samāpadyeta niḥsargikā pātayantikā 19
T02prmosu_u:137: yaḥ punar bhikṣur nānāprakāraṃ krayavikrayaṃ samāpadyeta niḥsargi(kā
T02prmosu_u:139: daśāhaparamaṃ bhikṣuṇā atiriktaṃ pātraṃ dhārayitavyaṃ tata uttaraṃ dhārayen niḥ(sa)r(gikā pātayantikā) 21
T02prmosu_u:140: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ sati pāribhogīye pātre ūnapañcabandhane anyaṃ navaṃ pātraṃ vijñāpayet kalyāṇakāmatām upādāya niḥsargikā pātayantikā /
T02prmosu_u:141: tena bhikṣuṇā tat pātraṃ bhikṣupariṣadi niḥsṛṣṭavyaṃ yas tasyāṃ bhikṣupariṣadi pātraparyantaḥ sa tasyānupradātavyaḥ idaṃ te bhikṣo pātraṃ na visarjayitavyaṃ na vikalpayitavyaṃ yāvad bhedād dhārayitavyaṃ iyaṃ tatra sāmīciḥ 22
T02prmosu_u:142: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ svayācitaṃ sūtraṃ vijñapya ajñātinā tantravāyena cīvaraṃ vāyayen niḥsargikā pātayantikā 23
T02prmosu_u:143: bhikṣuṃ ced uddiśya ajñātir gṛhapatir gṛhapatipatnī vā tantravāyena cīvaraṃ vāyayet tatra cet sa bhikṣuḥ pūrvam apravāritaḥ samāna upasaṃkramya taṃ tantravāyaṃ kaṃcid eva vikalpam āpadyann evaṃ vaded yad āyuṣmaṃ tantravāya jānāsi idaṃ cīvaraṃ mām uddiśya ūyate sādhv āyuṣmān etac cīvaraṃ sūtaṃ ca karotu sulikhitaṃ ca suvistṛtaṃ ca sutakṣitaṃ ca apy
T02prmosu_u:144: eva vayam āyuṣmataḥ k(i)ṃcid eva mātram upasaṃhariṣyāmaḥ piṇḍapātaṃ vā piṇḍapātamātraṃ vā piṇḍapātasaṃvaraṃ vā evaṃ cet sa bhikṣus taṃ tantravāyaṃ saṃjña(pya vā) saṃjñāpya vā tataḥ
T02prmosu_u:145: paścāt k(i)ṃcid eva mātram upasaṃhared piṇḍapātaṃ vā piṇḍapātamātraṃ vā piṇḍapātasaṃvaraṃ vā cīvarasyābhiniṣpattaye abhiniṣpanne cīvare niḥsargikā
T02prmosu_u:147: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣoḥ pātraṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā dattvā tataḥ paścād abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍīkṛto 'nāptamanā ācchindyād ācchedayed vā ānaya bhikṣo cīvaraṃ na te bhūyo dadāmīti tena bhikṣuṇā sa vastuśeṣo niḥsṛṣṭavyo
T02prmosu_u:149: māsaśeṣe grīṣme bhikṣuṇā varṣāśāṭīcīvaraṃ paryeṣitavyaṃ yāvad ardhamāsakṛtāsu varṣāsu dhārayitavyaṃ
T02prmosu_u:150: arvāk ced bhikṣur māsaśeṣād grīṣmād varṣāśāṭīcīvaraṃ paryeṣeta ūrdhvaṃ cārdhamāsakṛtāsu varṣāsu dhārayen niḥsargikā pātayantikā 26
T02prmosu_u:151: daśāhānāgatāyāṃ pravāraṇāyāṃ bhikṣor utpadyetākālacīvaram ākāṃkṣatā tena bhikṣuṇā pratigṛhītavyaṃ pratigṛhya yāvac cīvarakālasamayā(n) nikṣiptavyaṃ tata uttaram upanikṣipen niḥsargikā pātaya(n)tikā trayomāsānāgate kārttike pūrṇamāse ūnavarṣāraṇyako bhikṣu(r) āraṇyakeṣu śayyāsaneṣūpagataḥ sy(ā)t sāśaṅkasaṃmateṣu sabhayasaṃmateṣu sapratibhayabhairavasaṃmateṣu ākāṃkṣatāraṇyakena bhikṣuṇā trayāṇāṃ cīvarāṇām anyatamānyatamaṃ cīvaram antargṛhe upanikṣiptavyaṃ syād āraṇyakasya bhikṣos tathārūpapratyayo bahiḥsīmaṃ gantuṃ ṣaḍrātraparamam āraṇyakena bhikṣuṇā tataś cīvarād vipravastavyaṃ tata uttaraṃ vipravasen niḥsargikā pātayantikā 28
T02prmosu_u:152: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānaṃ sāṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇatam ātman(aḥ) pariṇāmayen niḥsargikā pātayantikā
T02prmosu_u:153: yāni tāni bhagavatā glānānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ sāṃpreyāṇi pratiṣevanīyāni bhaiṣajyāny anujñātāni tadyathā sarpis tailaṃ madhu phāṇitaṃ saptāhaparamaṃ tāni glānena bhikṣuṇā saṃnidhikāraparibhogena paribhoktavyāni tata uttaraṃ paribhuñjīta niḥsargikā pātayantikā 30 //
T02prmosu_u:154: uddiṣṭā mayāyuṣmantas triṃśan niḥsargikā(ḥ) pātayantikā dharmās tatrāham
T02prmosu_u:155: āyuṣmataḥ pṛcchāmi kaccit sthātra pariśuddhā dvir api trir api pṛcchāmi kaccit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi // //
T02prmosu_u:157: ime punar āyuṣmanto navati pātayantikā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti
T02prmosu_u:161: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānaṃ saṃghena yathādharmaṃ nikṣiptam adhikaraṇaṃ punaḥ karmaṇy utkoṭayet pātayantikā 4
T02prmosu_u:162: yaḥ punar bhikṣur mātṛgrāmasyottaraṃṣaṭpañcikayā vācā dharmaṃ deśayed anyatra vijñapuruṣāt pātayantikā 5
T02prmosu_u:163: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anupasaṃpannena pudgalena sārdhaṃ padaśo dharmaṃ vācayet pātayantikā 6
T02prmosu_u:164: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anupasaṃpannasya pudgalasyottaraṃmanuṣyadharmam ārocayed bhūtaṃ pātayantikā
T02prmosu_u:165: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣor jānaṃ duṣṭhūlām āpattim anupasaṃpannasya pudgalasyāntike ārocayed anyatra saṃghasaṃmatyā pā(ta)ya(n)tik(ā) 8
T02prmosu_u:166: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ pūrvaṃ samanujñako bhūtvā tataḥ paścād evaṃ vaded yathā saṃstutānām ime bhikṣavaḥ sāṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇāmayantīti pāta(yant)i(kā)
T02prmosu_u:167: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ prātimokṣasūtroddiśyamāne evaṃ vadet kiṃ punar ebhiḥ kṣudrānukṣudraiḥ śikṣāpadair uddiṣṭair yāni bhikṣūṇāṃ kaukṛtyāya vilekhāya viheṭhāya saṃvartantīti śikṣāvidaṇḍanāt pātayantikā bījagrāmabhūtagrāmapātanāt pā(ta)yantikā 11
T02prmosu_u:170: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ sāṃghikaṃ śayyāsanaṃ pīṭhaṃ vā mañcaṃ vā brisiṃ vā kurcaṃ vā abhyavakāśe prajñapya tataḥ prakramen noddharen noddhārayed vā pātayantikā 14
T02prmosu_u:171: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ sāṃghike vihāre śayyāṃ saṃstīrya vā saṃstārayed vā tataḥ prakramen noddharen noddhārayed vā pātayantikā (1)5
T02prmosu_u:172: yaḥ punar bhikṣur abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍīkṛto 'nāptamanāḥ sāṃghikād vihārād bhikṣuṃ niṣkarṣen niṣkarṣayed vā cara pareṇa mohapuruṣa naśya tvaṃ na tvayeha vastavyam idam eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā nānyathāt pā(tayantikā) 16
T02prmosu_u:173: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ sāṃghike vihāre jānaṃ pūrvopagatāṃ bhikṣ(ū)ṃ paścād āgatyānupraskadya śayyāṃ kalpayed yasya saṃbādhaṃ bhaviṣyati sa prakramiṣyatīti idam eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā nānyathāt pātayantikā (1)7
T02prmosu_u:174: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ sāṃghike vihāre uparivihāyasikuṭikāyām ahāryapādake pīṭhe vā mañce vā balena niṣīded vā nipadyed vā (pāta)yantikā
T02prmosu_u:175: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ saprāṇakenodakena tṛṇaṃ vā mṛttikaṃ vā siṃcet secayed vā pātayantikā
T02prmosu_u:176: mahallakaṃ bhikṣuṇā vihāraṃ kārayatā yāvad dvārakośārgaḍasthāpana
T02prmosu_u:179: yaḥ punar bhikṣur asaṃmataḥ saṃghena bhikṣuṇīr avavadet (p)ā(tayantikā 21)
T02prmosu_u:182: yaḥ punar bhikṣur evaṃ (va)ded āmiṣahetor bhikṣ(avo bhikṣuṇīr
T02prmosu_u:184: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣuṇyā sārdhaṃ saṃvidhāya samānamārgaṃ pratipadyetāntato grāmāntaram api anyatra samayāt pātayantikā (tatrā)yaṃ
T02prmosu_u:185: sama(yaḥ) sār(thagamanīyo mārgo bhavati sāśaṅkasaṃ)mataḥ sabhayasaṃmataḥ sapratibhayabhairavasaṃmato 'yaṃ tatra samayaḥ (2)4
T02prmosu_u:186: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣu(ṇyā sārdhaṃ saṃvidhā)yaikanāvam abhiruhed
T02prmosu_u:188: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ajñātyā bhikṣuṇyāś cīvaraṃ kuryāt pātayantikā (26)
T02prmosu_u:189: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ajñātyā bhikṣuṇyāś cīvaraṃ dadyāt pātayantikā (2)7
T02prmosu_u:190: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣuṇyā sārdham ekākī rahasi praticchanne niṣadyāṃ kalpayet pātayantikā
T02prmosu_u:191: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ekā(kī) mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdham abhyavakāśe niṣadyāṃ kalpayet pātayantikā (2)9
T02prmosu_u:192: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣuṇīparipācitaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjītānyatra
T02prmosu_u:194: paraṃparabhojanam anyatra samayāt pātayantikā tatrāyaṃ samayo glānasamayaś cīvaradānakālasamayo 'yaṃ tatra samayaḥ 31
T02prmosu_u:195: ekāvasathoṣitena bhikṣuṇā aglānenaikaḥ piṇḍapāta(ḥ) paribhoktavyas tata uttaraṃ paribhuṃjīta pā(tayantikā 32)
T02prmosu_u:196: (bhikṣa)vaḥ punaḥ saṃbahulāḥ kulāny upasaṃkrameyus tāṃś cec chrāddhā
T02prmosu_u:197: b(r)āhmaṇagṛ(ha)patay(o yāva)darthaṃ pravārayeyuḥ pūpair vā manthair vā ākāṃkṣamāṇais tair bhikṣubhi(r) dv(au) trayo (vā) pātrapūrāḥ
T02prmosu_u:199: dvau trīṃ vā pātrapūrāṃ pratigṛhya bahi(r ārā)maṃ (n)iṣk(r)amya santo bhikṣavaḥ saṃvedayitavyā iyaṃ tatra sāmīciḥ 33
T02prmosu_u:200: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhuktavāṃ pravāritaḥ akṛtā(t)iriktaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ khāded vā bhuṃjīta vā pātayantikā 34
T02prmosu_u:201: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānaṃ bhikṣuṃ bhuktavantaṃ pravāritam akṛt(āt)iriktena
T02prmosu_u:202: khādanīyabhojanīyena yāvadarthaṃ pravārayed idam āyuṣmaṃ khādeti bhuṃkṣvety āsādanaprekṣī kaccid eṣa bhikṣur muhūrtam apy āsāditaḥ syād idam eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā nānyathā pātayantikā gaṇabhojanam anyatra samayāt pātayantikā tatrāyaṃ samayo glānasamayaś cīvaradānakālasamayaḥ adhvānamārgasamayaḥ nāvādhirohaṇaṃ mahāsamājaśramaṇabhaktasamayo 'yaṃ tatra samayaḥ (3)6
T02prmosu_u:203: yaḥ punar bhikṣur akāle khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ khāded vā bhuṃjīta vā
T02prmosu_u:205: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ saṃnihitaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ khāded vā bhuṃjīta vā pātayantikā 38
T02prmosu_u:206: yaḥ punar bhikṣur aparigṛhītam āhāraṃ mukhadvāreṇāhared anyatrodakadantakāṣṭhābhyāṃ pātayantikā
T02prmosu_u:207: yāni punas tāni kuleṣu praṇītabhojanāny anujñātāni tadyathā kṣīraṃ dadhi navanītaṃ sarpis tailaṃ matsyo māṃsavallūrā yaḥ punar bhikṣur evaṃrūpāṇi praṇītabhojanāny ātmārtham aglāno vijñapayet pātayantikā 40 //
T02prmosu_u:208: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānaṃ saprāṇakam udakaṃ paribhuṃjīta pātayantikā 41
T02prmosu_u:209: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ sabhojane kule anupraskadya āsane niṣadyāṃ kalpayet pātayantikā 42
T02prmosu_u:210: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ sabhojane kule ekākī ekayā rahasi praticchanne niṣadyāṃ kalpayet pātayantikā
T02prmosu_u:211: yaḥ punar bhikṣur acelakasya parivrājakasya vā parivrājikāyā vā svahastaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ dadyāt pātayantikā 44
T02prmosu_u:212: yaḥ punar bhikṣur udyuktāṃ senāṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramed anyatras tathārūpapratyayāt pātayantikā
T02prmosu_u:213: syād bhikṣos tathārūpapratyayo yenodyuktāṃ senāṃ gacched dvirātraparamaṃ tena bhikṣuṇā tatra senāyāṃ vastavyaṃ tata uttaraṃ vaset pātayantikā 46
T02prmosu_u:214: dvirātraparamaṃ ced bhikṣuḥ senāyāṃ vasaty udyūthikāṃ senāṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramed dhvajāgraṃ vā balāgraṃ vā senāvyūhaṃ vā anīkadarśanaṃ vā pātayantikā 47
T02prmosu_u:215: yaḥ punar bhikṣur abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto 'nāpta(ma)nā bhikṣoḥ prahāraṃ dadyāt pāta(yantikā)
T02prmosu_u:216: (yaḥ puna)r bhikṣur abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto 'nāptamanā bhikṣos talaśaktikayā prahāram avaguret pātayantikā (49)
T02prmosu_u:217: (yaḥ) punar bhikṣur bhikṣor j(ā)naṃ duṣṭhūlāpatti(ṃ) praticchādayed antata ekarātram api pā(tayantikā) 50
T02prmosu_u:218: ya(ḥ pu)nar bhikṣur bhikṣum evaṃ vaded ehy āyuṣmaṃ kulāny upasaṃkramiṣyāvas tatra te dāpayiṣyāmi praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ sa tasya bhikṣor adāpayitvā tataḥ paścād evaṃ vaded gaccha tvam āyuṣman na me
T02prmosu_u:219: tvayā sārdhaṃ phāṣa(ṃ) kathā vā niṣadyā vā ekākino me phāṣaṃ kathā vā
T02prmosu_u:220: niṣadyā vā udyojanaprekṣī kaccid eṣa bhikṣur muhūrtam apy udyojitaḥ syād etad eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā nānyathā pātayantikā (5)1
T02prmosu_u:221: yaḥ punar bhikṣur aglāno vitapanaprekṣī abhyavakāśe jyotiḥ samindhyāt samedhayed vānyatra pratyayāt pātayantikā (5)2
T02prmosu_u:222: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anupasaṃpannena pudgalena sārdham uttaraṃdvirātraṃ sahāgāraśayyāṃ kalpayet pātayantikā (5)3
T02prmosu_u:223: yaḥ punar bhikṣur dhārmike saṃghakaraṇīye cchandaṃ dat(t)vā tataḥ paścāt kṣepadharmam āpadyeta pātayantikā (5)4
T02prmosu_u:224: yaḥ punar bhikṣur evaṃ vadet tathāhaṃ bhagavato dharma(ṃ) deśitam ājānāmi ye antarāyikā dharmās tāṃ pratiṣevato nālam antarāyāyeti sa bhikṣur
T02prmosu_u:225: bhikṣubhir evaṃ syād vacanīyo mā tvam āyuṣmann evaṃ vada tathāhaṃ bhagavato dharmaṃ deśitam ājānāmi ye antarāyikā dharmās tāṃ pratiṣevato nālam antarāyāyeti mā bhagavantaṃ vivada mā bhagavantam abhyākhyāhi na sādhu bhagavato
T02prmosu_u:226: 'bhyākhyānaṃ bhavati na ca punar bhagavān evaṃ vaded anekaparyāyeṇa bhagavatā antarāyikā dharmāḥ samānā antarāyikā dharmā ity uktās tāṃś ca pratiṣevato 'lam antarāyāyeti niḥsṛja tvam āyuṣmann idam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakaṃ dṛṣṭigatam eva(ṃ) ce(t sa) bhikṣur bhikṣubhir ucyamānas tad vastu pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ na cet pratiniḥsṛjed dvir api trir api samanuśāsitavyas tasya
T02prmosu_u:227: vastunaḥ pratiniḥsargāya (dv)ir api trir api samanuśiṣyamāṇas tad vastu
T02prmosu_u:228: pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjet pātayantikā 55
T02prmosu_u:229: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānaṃs tathāvādinaṃ pudgalam akṛtānudharmāṇam apratiniḥsṛṣṭena pāpakena dṛṣṭigatena saṃbhuṃjīta vā saṃvased vā tena vā sārdhaṃ sahāgāraśayyāṃ kalpayet pātayantikā śramaṇoddeśaś ced evaṃ vadet tathāhaṃ bhagavato dharmaṃ deśitam ājānāmi yat kāmāṃ pratiṣevato nālam antarāyāyeti /
T02prmosu_u:230: sa śramaṇoddeśo bhikṣubhir evaṃ syād vacanīyo mā tvam āyuṣmaṃ śramaṇoddeśa evaṃ vada tathāhaṃ bhagavato dharmaṃ deśitam ājānāmi yat kāmāṃ pratiṣevato nālam antarāyāyeti mā bhagavantaṃ vivada mā bhagavantam abhyākhyāhi na sādhu bhagavato
T02prmosu_u:231: 'bhyākhyānaṃ bhavati na ca punar bhagavān evaṃ vaded anekaparyāyeṇa bhagavatā antarāyikāḥ kāmāḥ samānā antarāyikā ity uktās tāṃś ca
T02prmosu_u:232: pratiṣevato 'lam antarāyāyeti niḥsṛja tvaṃ śramaṇoddeśa idam evaṃrūpaṃ
T02prmosu_u:233: pāpakaṃ dṛṣṭigatam evaṃ cet sa śramaṇoddeśo bhikṣubhir ucyamānas tat pāpakaṃ dṛṣṭigataṃ pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛje(d) dvir api trir api samanuśāsitavyas tasya vastunaḥ pratiniḥsargāya sa yāva(d) dvir api trir
T02prmosu_u:234: api samanuśiṣyamāṇa(ḥ) sacet pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjet sa śramaṇod(d)eśo bhikṣubhir evaṃ syād vacanīyaḥ adyāgreṇa te śramaṇoddeśa na sa bhagavāṃ śāstā vyapadeṣṭavyo nāpy anye bhikṣavaḥ samanubandhitavyā yām apy anye śramaṇodd(eś)ā labhante bhikṣubhiḥ sārdhaṃ dvirātraṃ sahāgāraśayyāṃ sāpi te adyāgreṇa nāsti cara pareṇa mohapuruṣa naśya tvaṃ na tvayeha vastavyam iti /
T02prmosu_u:235: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānaṃs tathānāśitaṃ śramaṇoddeśam upasthāpayed vā upalāḍayed vā tena vā sārdhaṃ sahāgāraśayyāṃ kalpayet pātayantikā 57
T02prmosu_u:236: yaḥ punar bhikṣu ratnaṃ vā ratnasaṃmataṃ vā svahastam udgṛhṇīyād udgrāhayed vā anyatrādhyārāmagatād vā adhyāvāsagatād vā pātayantikā adhyārāmagataṃ adhyāvāsagataṃ ratnaṃ vā ratnasaṃmataṃ vā evaṃcittenodgṛhītavyam udgrāhayitavyaṃ vā yasya bhaviṣyati sa enaṃ hariṣyati iyaṃ tatra sāmīciḥ navacīvarapratilābhād bhikṣuṇā trayāṇāṃ durvarṇīkaraṇānām anyatamānyatamam ādātavyaṃ navasya durvarṇīkaraṇāya nīlaṃ vā kardamo vā kāḍiśāmo vā anādāya ced bhikṣus trayāṇāṃ durvarṇīkaraṇānām anyatamānyatamaṃ durvarṇīkaraṇaṃ navaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuṃjīta pātayantikā 59
T02prmosu_u:237: ardhamāsikaṃ snātram anyatra samayāt tadatikrāmataḥ pātayantikā tatrāyaṃ samayaḥ sārdho māsaḥ śeṣo grīṣmasya pūrvo māso varṣāṇām etau sārdhau dvau māsau paridāghasamayaḥ avaśiṣṭaṃ glānasamayaḥ karmasamayo vātasamayo vṛṣṭisamayo 'dhvānamārgasamayo 'yaṃ tatra samayaḥ 60 //
T02prmosu_u:238: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ saṃcintya tīryagyonigataṃ prāṇinaṃ jīvitād vyaparopayet pātayantikā 61
T02prmosu_u:239: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣoḥ saṃcintya kaukṛtyam upasaṃhared viheṭhanāprekṣī kaccid asya bhikṣor muhūrtam api tāvad aphāṣaṃ bhaved idam eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā nānyathā pātayantikā (6)2
T02prmosu_u:242: yaḥ punar bhikṣur mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ sahāgāraśayyāṃ kalpayet pātayantikā (6)5
T02prmosu_u:243: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣuṃ bhīṣayed bhīṣāpayed vā antato hāsyaprekṣyam api pātayantikā (6)6
T02prmosu_u:244: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣoḥ pātraṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā kuñcikaṃ vā upānahaṃ vā sūcīgharakaṃ vā anyatamānyatamaṃ vā śrāmaṇakaṃ pariṣkāram upanidadhyād upanidhāpayed vā antato hāsyaprekṣyam api pātayantikā yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣoḥ pātraṃ vā cīvaram vā dat(t)vā tataḥ paścād apratyuddhārya paribhuṃjīta pātayantikā 68
T02prmosu_u:245: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣum amūlakena saṃghāvaśeṣeṇa dharmeṇānudhvaṃsayet pātayantikā 69
T02prmosu_u:246: yaḥ punar bhikṣur mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ saṃvidhāya samānamārgaṃ pratipadyeta antato grāmāntaram api pātayantikā 70 //
T02prmosu_u:247: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ steyasārthena sārdhaṃ saṃvidhāya samānamārgaṃ pratipadyeta antato grāmāntaram api pātayantikā 71
T02prmosu_u:248: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ūnaviṃśativarṣaṃ pudgalaṃ bhikṣubhāvenopasaṃpādayet pātayantikā sa ca pudgalo 'nupasaṃpannas te ca bhikṣavo garhyā iyaṃ tatra
T02prmosu_u:250: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ pṛthivīṃ khanyāt khānayed vā pātayantikā (7)3
T02prmosu_u:251: caturmāsikā bhikṣuṇā pravāraṇā sādhayitavyā anyatra nityapravāraṇāyā anyatra punaḥpunaḥpravāraṇāyā anyatra pratyekapravāraṇāyā tata uttaraṃ sādhayet pātayantikā 74
T02prmosu_u:252: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣubhir ucyamāna iha te śikṣāyāṃ śikṣitavyam ity evaṃ vaden nāhaṃ yuṣmākaṃ bālānāṃ mūḍhānāṃ duṣprajñānāṃ vacanenātra śikṣāyāṃ śikṣiṣyāmi anyān ahaṃ bhikṣūṃ prakṣyāmi sūtradharān vinayadharān mātṛkādharān iti pātayantikā /
T02prmosu_u:253: ājñātukāmena bhikṣuṇā tatra śikṣāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ bhikṣavaś ca praṣṭavyāḥ sūtradharā vinayadharā mātṛkādharāḥ /
T02prmosu_u:255: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣūṇāṃ kalahajātānāṃ bhaṇḍanajātānāṃ vigṛhītānāṃ vivādam āpannānāṃ tūṣṇīm upaśrutikas tiṣṭhed yad ete bhikṣavo vakṣyanti tad ahaṃ śrutvā tathānuvyāhariṣyāmīti pā(tayantikā) yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ saṃghasy(a) n(i)ścitāyāṃ kathāyāṃ vartamānāyāṃ tūṣṇīm
T02prmosu_u:256: utthāya prakramet saṃtaṃ bhikṣum anava(lokya pātaya)ntikā (77)
T02prmosu_u:259: yaḥ punar bhikṣur akāle grāmaṃ praviśet santaṃ bhikṣum anavalokyānyatra tathārūpapratyayāt pātayantikā 80 //
T02prmosu_u:260: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ sabhaktaṃ(?) kuleṣūpanimantritaḥ pūrvabhaktaṃ paścādbhaktaṃ kuleṣu cāritram āpadyeta pā(tayantikā) 81
